content: the sawyers blanket crochet pattern features several sizes from a small security blanket to a large throw and includes two design options with an easy four-row repeat and basic stitches such as half_double_crochet and double_crochet us terms this pattern is perfect for both beginners and seasoned crocheters download this versatile and detailed pattern today and start creating your own stunning sawyer s blanket ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification you will get 2 files with this purchase - one in us terms and one in uk terms ❤ size written for 5 sizes - security 14 x 17 - baby blanket 30 x 35 - receiving blanket 40 x 40 - crib 45 x 60 - throw 52 x 60 ❤ materials 4 weight yarn 250-2260 yards depending on size 5mm hook scissors tapestry needle stitch markers optional to mark first or last stitch of the row
